author: Simon Difford
description: A tequila (instead of vodka) based Porn Star Martini. ('Estrella Porno' is Spanish for 'Porn Star'.)
name: Estrella Porno Martini
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: To make a Estrella Porno Martini you'll first need to flavour your tequila with a vanilla pod
Simply cut the vanilla pod lengthways to expose the flavoursome seeds inside and drop the whole vanilla pod into your bottle of tequila
Reseal and shake bottle several times a day for at least two days, preferably a week
To make your cocktail, wash and cut passion fruits in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh of 3 halves into shaker
(Keep last passion fruit half for garnish)
Add next four ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
POUR champagne into chilled shot glass to serve on the side
Instruct drinker to sip alternately from each glass
